SEARCH
Package upei.project.Strategy

Class CautiousSaverStrategy

java.lang.Object
upei.project.Strategy.CautiousSaverStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Strategy
public class CautiousSaverStrategy extends Object implements Strategy
CautiousSaverStrategy This strategy represents a player who is cautious with their spending. The player only buys or upgrades properties if doing so keeps their balance above a defined safety threshold.

  • Method Details

    • shouldBuyLand

      public boolean shouldBuyLand(Property property, int balance)
      Determines whether the player should buy a property they land on. The player buys the property only if it is unowned and purchasing it keeps their balance above the safety threshold.
      Specified by:
      shouldBuyLand in interface Strategy
      Parameters:
      property - the property the player landed on
      balance - the player's current balance
      Returns:
      true if the property should be bought, false otherwise

    • shouldBuyProperty

      public boolean shouldBuyProperty(Property property, int balance)
      Determines whether the player should upgrade a property they already own. The player upgrades the property only if the upgrade cost keeps their balance above the safety threshold.
      Specified by:
      shouldBuyProperty in interface Strategy
      Parameters:
      property - the property to be upgraded
      balance - the player's current balance
      Returns:
      true if the property should be upgraded, false otherwise
